name: HENTAI FIGHT CLUB (itch)
description:
Sexy hentai girls want to fight you.
Will you take the challenge?
For the win get enough points in match-3 puzzle.
Girls take defeat so seriously, that even lose their clothes.

FEATURES
-Different Fighter Girls to Undress

-GOOD MUSIC

Relax and Enjoy. Try to get high Scores and be happy!
